attributes.action: Ban supermarkets from issuing plastic carrier bags to customers and food producers from shrink wrapping fresh food products.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Supermarkets should be forced to cease the use of the "traditional" plastic carrier bag and introduce the cotton style reusable bags as used in Australia. Food manufacturers should also be forced to cease the shrink wrapping of fresh food products such as fruit and vegetables. All other packaging should be reduced to the bare minimum.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
